titleStmt.title: By the lord lieutenant general, and general governor of Ireland whereas we are informed that the souldiers of His Majesties army have been constrained for want of their pay, to run in debt in their several quarters for necessary provisions ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1662-1664 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first line of text.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin, the 18th of Decemb. 1662."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
